casebody.data:
Citytrust v. Peter C. Steele et al. (12654)

Lavery, Freedman and Cretella, Js.

Submitted on briefs February 28 decision released March 22, 1994 *948Christopher C. Noble, for the appellant (named defendant et al.). Jonathan D. Elliot and Monica M. Copertino filed a brief for the appellee (substitute plaintiff). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed and the case is remanded for the purpose of setting new law days.
